TestCase.name: testLookupWithCalcPushIntoLookupTableSource
TestCase.Resource: SELECT T.a, D.id FROM table1 AS T JOIN LookupTable FOR SYSTEM_TIME AS OF T.proctime AS D ON T.a = D.id

LogicalProject(a=[$0], id=[$4]) +- LogicalCorrelate(correlation=[$cor0], joinType=[inner], requiredColumns=[{0, 3}]) :- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], proctime=[PROCTIME()]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, table1]]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[=($cor0.a, $0)]) +- LogicalSnapshot(period=[$cor0.proctime]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, LookupTable]])

FlinkLogicalJoin(condition=[=($0, $1)], joinType=[inner]) :- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a]) : +- FlinkLogicalTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, table1]], fields=[a, b, c]) +- FlinkLogicalSnapshot(period=[$cor0.proctime]) +- FlinkLogicalTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, LookupTable, project=[id]]], fields=[id])

TestCase.name: testLookupWithComputedColumnAndCalcPushIntoLookupTableSource
TestCase.Resource: SELECT T.a, D.id FROM table1 AS T JOIN LookupTableWithComputedColumn FOR SYSTEM_TIME AS OF T.proctime AS D ON T.a = D.id WHERE D.computed_age + 1 > 60

LogicalProject(a=[$0], id=[$4]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>(+($7, 1), 60)]) +- LogicalCorrelate(correlation=[$cor0], joinType=[inner], requiredColumns=[{0, 3}]) :- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], proctime=[PROCTIME()]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, table1]]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[=($cor0.a, $0)]) +- LogicalSnapshot(period=[$cor0.proctime]) +- LogicalProject(id=[$0], name=[$1], age=[$2], computed_age=[+($2, 1)]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, LookupTableWithComputedColumn]])

FlinkLogicalJoin(condition=[=($0, $1)], joinType=[inner]) :- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a]) : +- FlinkLogicalTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, table1]], fields=[a, b, c]) +- FlinkLogicalSnapshot(period=[$cor0.proctime]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[id], where=[>(+(+(age, 1), 1), 60)]) +- FlinkLogicalTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, LookupTableWithComputedColumn, project=[id, age]]], fields=[id, age])

TestCase.name: testLookupWithConditionAndCalcPushIntoLookupTableSource
TestCase.Resource: SELECT T.a, D.id FROM table1 AS T JOIN LookupTable FOR SYSTEM_TIME AS OF T.proctime AS D ON T.a = D.id WHERE D.age + 1 > 60

LogicalProject(a=[$0], id=[$4]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[>(+($6, 1), 60)]) +- LogicalCorrelate(correlation=[$cor0], joinType=[inner], requiredColumns=[{0, 3}]) :- LogicalProject(a=[$0], b=[$1], c=[$2], proctime=[PROCTIME()]) : +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, table1]]) +- LogicalFilter(condition=[=($cor0.a, $0)]) +- LogicalSnapshot(period=[$cor0.proctime]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, LookupTable]])

FlinkLogicalJoin(condition=[=($0, $1)], joinType=[inner]) :- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[a]) : +- FlinkLogicalTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, table1]], fields=[a, b, c]) +- FlinkLogicalSnapshot(period=[$cor0.proctime]) +- FlinkLogicalCalc(select=[id], where=[>(+(age, 1), 60)]) +- FlinkLogicalTableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, LookupTable, project=[id, age]]], fields=[id, age])
